title: Safety demonstration on the band saw
creator_credit: Charles Cahill and Associates, E P Research and Robert L Wilkens
brief_description: Demonstrates the operation of a band saw and the basic safety procedures to follow when using it. Explains the different cuts, and use of various holding devices.
creator_credit_for_label: Charles Cahill and Associates, E P Research and Robert L Wilkens
